name: Tinkering Fingers
summary: You're good with your hands and can quickly improvise a fix for broken or damaged equipment.
description:
You're good with your hands and can quickly improvise a fix for broken or damaged equipment. You're trained in Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can Repair an item without using a repair kit without taking the â€“2 circumstance penalty, improvising tools from whatever you have at hand.Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
